short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all spoiler content from youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you add keywords based on which it blurs video cards from youtube. This helps you avoid spoilers and enjoy your youtube experience. You can still choose to watch the blurred video by changing toogling it's visibility.
